key.name: default-status-notcleared
key.description: Default status for QIF transaction when not specified in QIF file.

key.name: default-status-cleared
key.description: Default status for QIF transaction when not specified in QIF file.

key.name: default-status-reconciled
key.summary: When the status is not specified in a QIF file, the transactions are marked as reconciled.
key.description: Default status for QIF transaction when not specified in QIF file.

key.name: last-geometry
key.description: This setting describes the size and position of the window when it was last closed. The numbers are the X and Y coordinates of the top left corner of the window followed by the width and height of the window.

key.name: last-path
key.description: This field contains the last pathname used by this window. It will be used as the initial filename/pathname the next time this window is opened.

key.name: show-doc
key.description: Show some documentation-only pages in QIF Import assistant.
